items.sentence: Tom fell in love with Mary the moment he met her.
Tom fell off a ladder and broke both of his arms.
Tom figured out how to fix the engine on his own.
I was told that you know Tom\'s telephone number.
I wasn\'t very hungry, so I decided to eat later.
Tom doesn\'t often do his homework before dinner.
Tom doesn\'t really talk about his problems much.
Tom doesn\'t seem to want to go to bed right now.
Tom doesn\'t take very good care of his children.
Tom doesn\'t want to talk about his private life.
